◆ dfs()

bool DGraph::dfs ( int  src,
uSet< int > *  seen = nullptr 
)
protected

recursive implementation of the Depth-First Search algorithm, which traverses the graph in search of cycles

Time Complexity:
O(|V| + |E|)
Parameters
srcindex of the vertex where the algorithm will start
seenset containing the indices of the vertices that have been visited
Returns
'true' if the a cycle is found, 'false' otherwise
